name: Need4Seed: Dublin Drift
description:
Need For Seed: Dublin Drift is a demo game I made for a college assignment. Control a bird of your choosing as you fly around a real life map of Dublin*. Beat your personal best time - unfortunately I didn't have time to work on an opponent to race so it's limited to beating your own time. 

*building heights not to scale!

V6 is the best with better audio and collisions, but V5 is still up as v6 was added after submission date for college assignment.
